content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/green/puYear=2018/puMonth=5/part-00087-tid-6037743401120983271-619c4849-c957-4290-a1b8-66832cb385b6-12506.c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [r];
